title: New: Thigh Master – D.D.
content:
Australia coming up trumps yet again, with Brisbane trio Thigh Master cranking it up.

Scuzzy Buzzcocks meets The Libertines ‘pop hitz’ (their words, not mine), D.D., the B-side to their upcoming single, Head of the Witch, is a three minute blast through almost every rock and roll key influencer of the past forty years. Raw vocals, relatively simplistic guitar lines, it’s something NME might have pedalled… back when NME was good. Check out D.D. below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
